statements: SELECT * FROM aircraft_inventory;
SELECT aircraft_id, aircraft_type, manufacturer FROM aircraft_inventory;
SELECT registration_number, aircraft_type, year_of_manufacture FROM aircraft_inventory WHERE engine_type = 'Jet';
SELECT * FROM aircraft_inventory WHERE manufacturer = 'Airbus' ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT aircraft_id, manufacturer, location FROM aircraft_inventory WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM aircraft_inventory WHERE aircraft_type = 'Boeing 737' AND manufacturer = 'Boeing'
SELECT aircraft_type, year_of_manufacture FROM aircraft_inventory WHERE engine_type = 'Turbofan'
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS count FROM aircraft_inventory GROUP BY manufacturer ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT * FROM aircraft_inventory WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010 OR location LIKE 'USA%'
SELECT aircraft_type, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture, location FROM aircraft_inventory ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC, manufacturer
SELECT aircraft_name, aircraft_type, year_of_manufacture FROM aircraft_inventory;
SELECT * FROM aircraft_inventory ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT aircraft_name, aircraft_type, year_of_manufacture FROM aircraft_inventory WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_aircraft FROM aircraft_inventory GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT supplier, SUM(quantity_in_stock) AS total_quantity FROM parts_inventory GROUP BY supplier ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM aircraft_inventory WHERE aircraft_type='Commercial';
SELECT aircraft_name, manufacturer FROM aircraft_inventory WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2000 ORDER BY aircraft_name DESC;
SELECT aircraft_name, aircraft_type, year_of_manufacture FROM aircraft_inventory WHERE manufacturer='Boeing' AND year_of_manufacture BETWEEN 2000 AND 2020 ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT part_name, supplier, unit_price FROM parts_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_aircraft, aircraft_type FROM aircraft_inventory GROUP BY aircraft_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM aircraft_inventory;
SELECT aircraft_name, aircraft_model, manufacture_date FROM aircraft_inventory;
SELECT aircraft_id, aircraft_name, aircraft_type FROM aircraft_inventory WHERE aircraft_type = 'Passenger';
SELECT * FROM parts_inventory ORDER BY part_supplier DESC;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM maintenance_records WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM aircraft_inventory ORDER BY aircraft_name ASC;
SELECT aircraft_name, aircraft_model, manufacture_date FROM aircraft_inventory WHERE manufacture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT aircraft_name, aircraft_type, manufacture_date, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM aircraft_inventory GROUP BY aircraft_type;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Engine Check' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT aircraft_name, part_name, quantity FROM aircraft_inventory JOIN parts_inventory ON aircraft_inventory.aircraft_id = parts_inventory.part_id;
SELECT * FROM Aircraft;
SELECT aircraft_id, aircraft_name FROM Aircraft;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT part_name, unit_price FROM Parts WHERE unit_price > 1000;
SELECT employee_name, position, department_name FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM Aircraft;
SELECT aircraft_name, manufacturer, model FROM Aircraft WHERE manufacturer='Boeing';
SELECT aircraft_id, aircraft_name, model FROM Aircraft ORDER BY aircraft_name DESC;
SELECT part_name, unit_price FROM Parts WHERE unit_price > 1000 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department_name FROM Employees WHERE position='Manager' ORDER BY employee_name;
SELECT * FROM aircrafts;
SELECT aircraft_name, aircraft_type FROM aircrafts WHERE manufacture_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM parts ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT mechanic_name, mechanic_specialty FROM mechanics WHERE mechanic_specialty = 'Avionics';
SELECT * FROM aircrafts WHERE manufacture_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT aircraft_name, aircraft_type FROM aircrafts ORDER BY aircraft_type DESC;
SELECT aircraft_name, aircraft_type, manufacture_date FROM aircrafts WHERE aircraft_type = 'Boeing 777';
SELECT part_name, quantity FROM parts WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY part_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%USA%' AND contact_person IS NOT NULL;
